timeline.bodyText: This seems like a weird name... What does an isBlock(Block) method do?
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +23,8 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2248 net/minecraft/block/Block
 		ARG 3 side
 	METHOD method_23349 getVelocityMultiplier ()F
 	METHOD method_23350 getJumpVelocityMultiplier ()F
+	METHOD method_27839 isBlock (Lnet/minecraft/class_2248;)Z
+		ARG 1 block

replies.bodyText: Checks if the block equals the block in parameter. Should I rename it to equals?
replies.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: Yeah they just uses this == block in implementation. I guess this is their effort to move away from hardcoding; and I personally suggest just calling the method is.
replies.author: liach
